notes.text: You can now enable keyboard shortcuts for custom actions in your application
SAP Fiori elements now displays an icon for Situation Handling
We've changed texts in the draft data loss popups for the create and save case
You can now export the content of a table as a PDF file
We've renamed the 'Cancel' button in the footer of the object page to 'Discard Draft'
After some usability testing we've now improved our handling of drafts - further improvements
We are now correctly handling undefined pageTitleInfo.subtitle
Personalization changes of chart are now stored/restored from iAppstate
SAP Fiori elements now supports the synchronization of data between pages when using the flexible column layout
The converter context now contains the correct data model path for filter fields
SAP Fiori elements now passes the correct contexts required for navigation to related apps
A link in the title of a quick view now contains the correct parameters
We've fixed the behavior of the Delete button after a user made changes in the table personalization dialog using the Settings button
In a list report using multiple table mode, the saved tile when using 'Share' now shows the number of records found in the selected table
SAP Fiori elements now supports internalization on the quick filters
We've resolved the console error related to a duplicate ID for the TableValueHelp
After some usability testing we've now improved our handling of drafts
We've made some corrections to our custom filter support
The row reference is now displayed properly in the message popover when a client-side error arises in the first column of a table
You can now format the DateTimeOffset with a specified timezone
V4:FE In SAP Fiori elements for OData V4, you can now use the new dynamic date range control for DateTime fields in the filter bar
SAP Fiori elements for OData V4 now supports charts based on draft-enabled entity sets
You can now define the visibility of a view when you're using multiple table mode in a list report
A filter field with a default value in the filter bar is now only shown if it is part of the selection fields
The focus is now set correctly on the cell of a table also in full-screen mode
Draft handling is now processed correctly using flexible column layout when navigating to another object in the list report
Alignment and overlapping issues in the object page header upon resize have been corrected
In an FCL application the 3rd column isn't closed anymore when editing, saving or canceling
Quick views now contain the correct navigation targets
SAP Fiori elements now supports the property 'Importance' for building block columns
After using the "Save as Tile" function and clicking on the new app, it now opens in the same tab
The DraftIndicator status is now displayed as the last element in a FieldGroup
